A big flagship set these days tops out in the range of 3,250 or 3,500 pieces. The very top end is 5,922 for the Taj Mahal. It's doubtful that an Ideas project can succeed with even 1,500+ pieces. The sweet spot is probably in the range of 500-800 pieces for a large Ideas set. Part of the challenge is to achieve more with less. That's the one area where I would knock this set. The ten-cents-per-piece ratio is likely sacrosanct, and this set would cost US$700 plus.
